MS.S: A Cross-Platform PowerShell framework for creating web servers to host REST APIs and Websites. Pode also has support for being used in Azure Functions and AWS Lambda.

A Cross-Platform PowerShell framework for creating web servers to host REST APIs and Websites. Pode also has support for being used in Azure Functions and AWS Lambda.
